cards: [ctx_1] Utah, United States — Utah Code §13-2c-301 et seq. — "Minor Access Restrictions **Curfew Requirements:**"
[ctx_2] Utah, United States — Utah Code §13-2c-301 et seq. — "Social media platforms must restrict access for users under 18 between 10:30 PM and 6:00 AM"
[ctx_3] Utah, United States — Utah Code §13-2c-301 et seq. — "Time zone compliance based on user's Utah location **Account Verification:**"
[ctx_4] Utah, United States — Utah Code §13-2c-301 et seq. — "Age verification required for all Utah residents"

passages.text: Social media platforms must restrict access for users under 18 between 10:30 PM and 6:00 AM
Time zone compliance based on user's Utah location **Account Verification:**
Age verification required for all Utah residents
